Normal Null Distribution

```{r}
    null_dist <- c()

    for(i in 1:10000) {
      sample_1 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      sample_2 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      null_dist <- c(null_dist,mean(sample_2)-mean(sample_1))
    }
```

```{r}
    y <- hist(null_dist, freq = FALSE)
    y$density
    i <- which(y$density < 0.05)
    i
    y$breaks[i[5]]
    
```

T-Distribution

```{r}
    1 - pt(c(.5,1,1.5,2,2.5), 9)

```

```{r}
    t_dist <- c()

    for(i in 1:10000) {
      sample_3 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      t_dist <- c(t_dist,(mean(sample_3)- 0)/(sd(sample_3)/(sqrt(length(sample_3)))))
    }
    hist(t_dist)
    
```


Correlation

```{r}
    corr_dist <- c()
    
    for(i in 1:10000) {
      x <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      y <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      corr_dist <- c(corr_dist, cor(x,y))
    }

    hist(corr_dist)
```

F-values

```{r}
    Subjects <- rep(1:4,each=4)
    A <- c(1,2,3,4)
    B <- c(3,4,5,6)
    C <- c(5,6,7,8)
    
    all_data <- data.frame(Subjects = as.factor(Subjects),
                       A,
                       B,
                       C)
```
